Text.val: 08.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.DATE, LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.LEGAL_OWNER, LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.DEBH_NO, LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.ADMNO, LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.CLNT_NO, CAST(LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.SUM_INVOICE AS DECIMAL(13,2)), LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.NO_INVOICE, CAST(LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.SUM_INVOICE AS DECIMAL(13,2)), LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.NO_INVOICE
from
(select SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV as DATE, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end as LEGAL_OWNER, SCHT_ADMNO as ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO AS CLNT_NO, sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTH) AS SUM_INVOICE, count(*) AS NO_INVOICE
from :1/SCHT join :1/SCHI on SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> :2 and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> 2 and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> :3
join
:1/debh on DEBH_NO = SCHI_DEBH_NO where SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV = ':5' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and (SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE = 1 or SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE = 3)
group by SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end, SCHT_ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO
having sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTH)>:4
) LEGAL_SUM_HEADER join
(select SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV as DATE, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end as LEGAL_OWNER, DEBH_NO, SCHT_ADMNO as ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO AS CLNT_NO, sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTH) AS SUM_INVOICE, count(*) AS NO_INVOICE
from :1/SCHT join :1/SCHI on SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> :2 and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> 2 and SCHI_DEBH_NO <> :3
join
:1/debh on DEBH_NO = SCHI_DEBH_NO where SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV = ':5' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and (SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE = 1 or SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE = 3)
group by SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end, DEBH_NO, SCHT_ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO
) LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL on LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.LEGAL_OWNER = LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.LEGAL_OWNER and LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.ADMNO = LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.ADMNO and LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.CLNT_NO = LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.CLNT_NO
order by LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.DATE,LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.LEGAL_OWNER,LEGAL_SUM_DETAIL.DEBH_NO,LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.ADMNO,LEGAL_SUM_HEADER.CLNT_NO
